comment: how would you overall rate it for gaming? i am looking for something that can convert to a tablet to take notes for college, but also something that can handle a bigger game like Battlefront II and COD. If there is a convertible that can do that do you have any suggestions?

name: Jack Connor
comment: I want to watcch youtube, a few dvds with external drive and run android aps should i get a chromebook or laptop? Im not to concerned with cost as iI am funtionality and screen display  oled sound and ability to run Android photo APS.

name: Harry Callum
comment: Note that the built-in SD card reader is very slow, and can be considered close to useless. A micro-sd card rated for 100 MB/s transfers at 20 MB/s. My little Lexar USB 3.0 SD card reader transfers files to the same computer at 80 MB/s.

name: Jacob Jacob
comment: What do you guys mean by the Spectre 'octopus' logo??? Is this review a joke?? That's not an actual con!

name: Charlie Kyle
comment: HP still sells the Spectre x360 13, but you can forget about it.

comment: 16Gb ceiling? Mine has 2 slots so 64Gb should be no problem. Loving mine so far.
